I just had this card graded. I've been collecting since the early 1980s and I am at a loss to explain why this only pulled a 2.

SOLD

Thanks
That is definitely one nice looking 2!

Gorgeous card. I’m about to send one in as well to SGC and was hopeful for a 3. Now I’ll be lucky if I get a 2 and probably a 1 compared to this beauty.

Good luck on your sale!

Bill

The grading scale has changed.

The tpgs have really screwed up the lower end in my opinion.
